programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Tiff Needell and Formula E racing driver Karun Chandhok put two supercar fast limos up against each other on the track - the Mercedes S63 AMG and Jaguar XJR. The team test the Citroen C4 Cactus, a car with airbags on outside.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Jason teaches Radio One's Comedy Dave to drive an Aston Martin convertible Jonny Smith gets a ride in Europe's fastest street legal car Tiff races two of the sharpest handling cars from Porsche and Lotus and Vicki visits the glamorous Paris Motorshow

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Jason's in Italy to drive the most talked about hypercar of the year - the 730bhp Pagani Huayra. He's given an exclusive tour of how this incredible machine is made at the company's HQ, and lets the car off the leash on road and track.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Tiff Needell is joined by rally star Kris Meeke for a hot hatch showdown. With four brand new models lined up at the track, they hold a high octane knockout tournament to find which is fastest of all.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Jason tests a brand new model from British track-car specialists Westfield. Tiff has rounded up the newest American muscle cars. Guest presenter Robert Llewellyn heads to Portugal to test a revolutionary electric car from Nissan.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Tiff Needell tests the two hottest hatches of the year with British rally legend Mark Higgins, the team test a brand new Mercedes convertible, Vicki Butler-Henderson races a brand new Ford Mustang.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Tiff gets behind the wheel of the £300,000 Lexus LFA hypercar, Jason pits the brand-new Mercedes E63AMG super saloon against the legendary Audi RS6 and Vicki gets her geek on as she samples the wealth of technology in the brand-new BMW 5 Series.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Vicki Butler-Henderson is taught how to drive a car on two wheels; Jonny Smith gets to be a real live human crash test dummy when he visits Germany for some extreme airbag testing.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Jason and Tiff try to master the controls of the Red Dragon, a 1700 hp Monster Truck. Jonny drives the new Renault Megane. Tom tests BMW's premium luxury car, the 7 Series. Tom Cave - a 17 year old Welsh rally sensation challenges Vicki.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Tiff tests this grand tourer's handling through the dramatic scenery of Snowdonia in Wales. Jason Plato tests the brand new £115,000 Aston Martin DB9 Volante, one of the fastest cabriolets on sale today.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Vicki Butler-Henderson and Tiff Needell look at the car accident that's ten times as likely to cause you an injury as any other; a rear impact.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Jason pits two diesel coupes against each other. Jonny braves the freezing weather to show off three cabriolets, with a budget of just £5,000. Tom puts the Ford Fiesta against the Seat Ibiza in three tests. Tiff drives the Lamborghini Gallardo

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Vicki Butler-Henderson makes some noise in TVR's new T350, a £40,000 coupe which promises 175mph, and 4 seconds to 60. Plus we find the ultimate bargain car.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Tiff Needell sets out to see whether it's possible to drive along the A537 from Macclesfield to Buxton, the most dangerous road in Britain, safely in the first Porsche Cayman in the country.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Vicki Butler-Henderson is finding out if progress has been made by Mitsubishi, as she races a classic Evo 6 against the very latest Evo 9.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Jason Plato gets a world's first test drive in the £380,000 Pagani Zonda F. Vicki Butler-Henderson heads to our Anglesey test track to race a Porsche 911 against the latest Lotus Exige.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Vicki Butler-Henderson finds out exactly how well built a Mercedes is when she crashes it, drowns it in a flood and then drives over it in a monster truck.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Vicki finds out how quick the police are on a racing track; Jonny tests small economy cars to find out if they can climb one of Britain's biggest hills; Sarah tries to out manoeuvre Jason in an articulated lorry and Tiff drives the new BMW M3.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Vicki Butler-Henderson welcomes Michael Schumacher to the show, for his only British television appearance this year. They go head to head on the track, in a very unusual challenge.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Tom Ford tests the latest version of the car that is perennially voted one of Britain's favourite cars - the Land Rover Defender. Jonny Smith celebrates Ferrari's 60th Birthday.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: In a superb world first, Tiff Needell gets to drive a Williams Formula 1 Grand Prix car. With exclusive access to the team we're allowed to follow Tiff every step of the way.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Adrian Simpson will be in Surrey for the The Mini World Show, a 45th Birthday Party for the Mini - attracting masterpieces from all over the world.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Tiff Needell tests the new MGTF. He finds it a better road car than the old MGL but it's still not a track day car. Quentin Willson reveals some ways people try to get off their speeding tickets.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: In an astonishing series of experiments Tiff Needell and Vicki Butler-Henderson find out just how dangerous ordinary items can be, and how you can best keep them under control in our cars.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Tiff Needell and Tom Ford test the new Citroen C6 by recreating the President de Gaulle assassination attempt with professional gunmen.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: The pestilential nuisance of cowboy clamping is now more common than ever. There are no rules or regulations governing the renegade companies that organise these rackets.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: In this edition of Fifth Gear Adrian Simpson will be asking what makes a celebrity car valuable and what doesn't, and he'll be meeting the people who buy them and collect them.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Do cars explode like they do in the movies? Tiff Needell and Adrian Simpson stage their own car chase and then watch the experts who've worked on James Bond movies take over for the special effects.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Tiff pits Renault's latest hot hatch the stripped out and hardcore Megane R26.R, against a Caterham CDX. Jonny brings us his verdict on the brand new Ford Ka. Tim delves into the world of car crime, to make us more aware of what criminals look for.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Tim Shaw tackles the horrible subject of car tax. Jason Plato meets Moto GP star James Toseland in another feature where Fifth Gear makes a sports stars dream come true. Tom Ford demonstrates the potential safety issues of convertibles.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Tiff drives the Lamborghini Gallardo Superleggera Jonny goes to meet another pioneer of alternative fuels - a cider farmer who uses rotten apples to produce methane that powers his Jaguar and Tom drives the £260,000 Rolls-Royce Drophead Coupe.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Tiff and Jason head to the track in the new BMW Z4 and Porsche Boxster. Jonny gets behind the wheel of what could be the most perfect car in the world - the brand new Golf GTi. Tiff Needell is in the first all-new Lotus for 13 years - the Evora.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Vicki tests two cars that are low, light and very fast - Lotus Exige S v Caterham CSR. Tom visits Spain to drive the Toyota Landcruiser. Jason Plato drives the Mercedes CLK63 Black. Tiff teaches Heston Blumenthal the art of powersliding.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Tom Ford spends the day with the scourge of modern day motorists - wheel clampers. Vicki Butler-Henderson tests the latest version of one of the greatest coupes of our time, the Nissan 350Z.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Tom Ford tests Nissan's new Micra. He finds it well-made and easy-to-drive. Adrian Simpson goes in search haunted cars. He starts by being very sceptical that haunted cars can exist at all.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Jason and Tiff take on a dogfight with a difference - racing buses! Jonny invents three practical tests for the new Mercedes E-Class. Tim investigates the Government's new scrappage system. Tom is on a mission in the stunning new Aston Martin.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Fifth Gear decides on its favourite sportscar. Which open-topped two seater offers the most fun - will it be a TVR, Lotus, or Porsche?

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Jason Plato is given his toughest mission yet - to do one month's motoring in 24 hours. It's in a bid to give the new BMW 3 Series the ultimate road test.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Tiff Needell and rally driver Mark Higgins set Olympic Skeleton Bob gold medallist Amy Williams and World Pentathlete champion Samantha Murray a track challenge. Expect car damage and the closest ever finish to a Fifth Gear celebrity contest.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Jonny Smith reveals the secrets of 21 st century car crash testing. He goes behind the scenes at a crash test performed by experts EuroNCAP, before conducting his own shocking crash test between a car and a van.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Vicki unveils the long-awaited new Tesla Model 3 electric car.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Jason experiences a cutting edge Formula One driving simulator, Tiff races 2 four wheel drive saloons head to head and Vicki gets behind the wheel of the multi-million pound Aston Martin DB5 as driven by James Bond in Goldfinger.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Jonny Smith goes behind-the-scenes at America's biggest motor race, the Indy 500. He hears what makes the event so special from triple winner Dario Franchitti, reveals the technical differences between F1 cars and Indy cars
